Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-47273 affecting package python-setuptools for versions less than 69.0.3-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-47273 affecting package python-setuptools for versions less than 69.0.3-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-setuptools is earlier than 69.0.3-5, affected by CVE-2025-47273
